chapter.title: Requirements
chapter.para: Spring Data Graph 1.x binaries requires JDK level 6.0 and above, and Spring Framework 3.0.x and above.
In terms of graph databases, Neo4J version 1.2 and above. Neo4J has a dependency on Apache Lucene for indexing.
For building the project Apache Maven (version 2.10 and above) is recommended.
